extendedInfo.description: KVOFamily.com is social networking platform for Kutchi Visa Oswal Jain (KVO) Community. It connects all members of community in a single family tree, creating the biggest collaborative community tree ever. Here you will find thousands of profiles and family trees of KVO community. You must belong to KVO to register in this site and use this application. We will personally screen your registration request, verify it against our community records and call you before approving your request.
